channel.title: Shuji Matsushita on Meishin Muso Ryu
channel.description: Recent content in Shuji Matsushita on Meishin Muso Ryu

item.title: Lessons from 2018 Iaido Seminar
item.description: Shuji Matsushita Sensei led the 2018 Fall Meishin Muso Ryu Iaido Seminar from Sept. 15-16 at Shudokan Dojo in Stroudsburg, PA. Here are some of our lessons …

item.title: Shudokan Kendo Godogeiko 2018
item.description: We hosted our first kendo summer godogeiko ever on Saturday, July 21. Our dojo was lucky enough to train with several high-ranking sensei and their students from several dojos.

item.title: Meishin Muso Ryu Official Website
item.description: Welcome to the official website of Meishin Muso Ryu, an Iaido style passed down from Shinkage Ryu.
